function moveHere(spotName,data,updateData,moveMode,setMoveMode){if(moveMode){let planeData;data.planes.forEach(plane=>{if(plane.tailNumber===moveMode){planeData=plane;}});if(Array.isArray(data.spots[planeData.spot].plane)){data.spots[planeData.spot].plane.splice(data.spots[planeData.spot].plane.indexOf(planeData),1);}else{data.spots[planeData.spot].plane=null;}planeData.spot=spotName;if(Array.isArray(data.spots[spotName].plane)){data.spots[spotName].plane.push(planeData);}else{data.spots[spotName].plane=planeData;}updateData(data);setMoveMode(null);}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"frame",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"title",className:"box title-box",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Aircraft Locations"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RampBox,{data:data,updateData:updateData,moveMode:moveMode,setMoveMode:setMoveMode,moveHere:moveHere}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DirectionBox,{data:data,updateData:updateData,moveMode:moveMode,setMoveMode:setMoveMode,moveHere:moveHere}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HangarsBox,{data:data,updateData:updateData,moveMode:moveMode,setMoveMode:setMoveMode,moveHere:moveHere}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(OtherBox,{data:data,updateData:updateData,moveMode:moveMode,setMoveMode:setMoveMode,moveHere:moveHere}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TDoorsBox,{data:data,updateData:updateData,moveMode:moveMode,setMoveMode:setMoveMode,moveHere:moveHere})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"note",children:"Made with love by Johnny Burrer :) Reach out on GroupMe with any feedback/bug reports!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PlaneBox,{data:data,moveMode:moveMode,setMoveMode:setMoveMode})]});}
